lyrics:
29 contributorsburning bridges lyricsverse 1
you and i were meant to be
aint no doubt about it
no way to hide that sort of thing
now im waiting for something better
aint nothing better worth imagining

prechorus
but i i keep on running
im building bridges that i know you never wanted
look for my heart you stole it away
now own every single road that i could take

listen i
want you to burn my bridges down down

want you to burn my bridges down down down
set me on fire

verse 2

send it where you want it

theres no filling up your spaces with fictionary places
imaginary faces they dont work at all
